Animals.name: Zebra
Animals.ability: when this enters play, put a Zebra from your deck into your hand
Animals.attack: deal 1 damage to each of your opponent's consumers for every Zebra you have in play

Animals.name: Cow
Animals.ability: at the start of your turn heal 1 damage from each of your consumers for every Cow you have in play. you can't use this ability if you have only 1 Cow in play.
Animals.attack: deal 1 damage to each of your opponent's consumers for every Cow you have in play

Animals.name: Perereca-verde
Animals.ability: If you are in a tree environment, this animal stays with more 3 hp

Animals.name: Jabuti
Animals.ability: when this animal enters in game, you can attach 2 shields to any of your pokemon
Animals.attack: deal 2 of damage. (If you kill the opposite animal, jabuti receives 1 shield)

Animals.name: Tucano
Animals.ability: fruits have double effect on this animal
Animals.attack: deals 1 of damage. (if you are with more than 4 energies in this round you deal 1 extra damage)
